meanings.definition: Resembling a horn in shape or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The unicorn had a hornlike projection on its forehead.
meanings.sent2: The ram's hornlike antlers curved gracefully.
meanings.sent3: The hornlike ice cream cone was a hit at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter had a hornlike quality, piercing through the silence.
meanings.sent5: The hornlike shadow of the tree stretched across the field.

meanings.sent1: The rhinoceros had a hornlike structure on its nose.
meanings.sent2: The bull's hornlike protrusions were intimidating.
meanings.sent3: The hornlike keychain was a quirky accessory.
meanings.sent4: His voice had a hornlike resonance, commanding attention.
meanings.sent5: The hornlike branches of the tree reached towards the sky.

meanings.definition: Growing or shaped like a horn.
meanings.sent1: The hornlike plant spiraled upwards towards the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The hornlike coral formations swayed gently in the water.
meanings.sent3: The hornlike hairstyle was a bold fashion statement.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as hornlike as the mountain peaks.
meanings.sent5: The hornlike structure of the building stood out against the skyline.
